name: Mini Fall
description:

PLAY NOW>>>>>>>>>>>

Stay alive as long as you can by controlling an awesome Mini Fall creature to help it pass through the holes and avoid being squished at the top by tilting your device. Score points and get power-ups on the way.

FEATURES:
- HD optimized graphics, enhanced for iPhone 5
- awesome power-ups
- simple controls
- fast-moving & addictive gameplay

REMINDER:
This game is awesome for both kids and adults. Play the game full on and don’t hesitate. Get your high score and experience the thrill and excitement of escaping being squished.
